aic2022.user

Interface UnitController


  • public interface UnitController
    Each unit has associated an instance of this class. It allows the unit to interact with the environment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack(Location loc)
      The unit attempts to attack a target location.
      boolean canAttack()
      Returns if this unit can attack this turn.
      boolean canAttack(Location loc)
      Returns if the unit can attack the given location.
      boolean canEnterDungeon(Direction dirEnter, Direction dirExit)
      Returns true if this unit can move this turn, there is a dungeon entrance adjacent to this unit following direction dirEnter, and the location adjacent to the entrance (inside the dungeon) following direction dirExit is accessible.
      boolean canGiveArtifact(int index, Direction dir)
      Returns if this unit can give target artifact to another unit of the same team following the given direction.

      Returns if this unit can level up.

      Returns if this unit can move this turn.

      Returns if a unit can move following the given direction.

      Returns if the unit can sense target location.

      Returns if this unit can create a unit of a given type following a given direction.

      Returns if this unit can use the given artifact.

      Returns if this unit can use its first ability on target location.

      Returns if this unit can use its second ability on target location.

      Draws a segment on the map between a given pair of locations and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates).
      void drawPointDebug(Location loc, int r, int g, int b)
      Draws a point on the map at a given location and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates).
      void enterDungeon(Direction dirEnter, Direction dirExit)
      Orders this unit to enter the dungeon following directions dirEnter and dirExit.

      Returns an array with all the artifacts that this unit has in possession.

        Returns the information about this unit. It costs 1 energy.

        Team getOpponent()
        Returns this unit's opponent. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        this unit's opponent.

      • canMove

        boolean canMove()
        Returns if this unit can move this turn. Returns true if and only if it is not a structure and its movement cooldown is strictly less than 1. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can move this turn.

      • canAttack

        boolean canAttack()
        Returns if this unit can attack this turn. Returns true its attack cooldown is strictly less than 1. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can attack this turn.

      • getType

        UnitType getType()
        Returns the type of this unit. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the type of this unit.

      • canMove

        boolean canMove(Direction direction)
        Returns if a unit can move following the given direction. It receives a penalty if the given direction is null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        direction - Given direction.
        Returns:
        if a unit can move following the given direction.

      • move

        void move(Direction direction)
        Attempts to move the unit following the given direction. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        direction - Given direction.

      • isObstructed

        boolean isObstructed(Location loc1,
                     Location loc2)
        Returns if the segment connecting two given locations is obstructed by a mountain. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc1 - First location
        loc2 - Second location
        Returns:
        if the segment connecting two given locations is obstructed by a mountain.

      • canAttack

        boolean canAttack(Location loc)
        Returns if the unit can attack the given location. It receives a penalty if the given location is null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location
        Returns:
        if the unit can attack the given location.

      • attack

        void attack(Location loc)
        The unit attempts to attack a target location. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.

      • canSenseLocation

        boolean canSenseLocation(Location loc)
        Returns if the unit can sense target location. It returns true if and only if the location is on the map, inside the unit's vision range, and if it has enough illumination. It receives a penalty if the given location is null. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.
        Returns:
        if the unit can sense target location.

      • isOutOfMap

        boolean isOutOfMap(Location loc)
        Returns if the given location is outside the map. It returns true if and only if the location is inside the unit's vision radius and outside of the map. It receives a penalty if the given location is null or outside of the unit's vision radius. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        if the given location is outside the map.

      • getVisibleLocations

        Location[] getVisibleLocations(int radiusSquared)
        Returns an array with all visible locations inside the map and inside a given radius. It receives a penalty if the given radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        Returns:
        an array with all visible locations inside the map and inside a given radius.

      • senseUnitAtLocation

        UnitInfo senseUnitAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the unit at a given location. It returns null if there is no unit. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the unit at a given location.

      • isPassable

        boolean isPassable(Location loc)
        Returns if the given location is passable or not. It receives a penalty if the unit cannot sense target location. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location.
        Returns:
        if the given location is passable or not.

      • senseUnits

        UnitInfo[] senseUnits(int radiusSquared,
                      Team team)
        Returns an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. If the team is null, it returns the units of all teams. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        team - Given team
        Returns:
        an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it.

      • senseUnits

        UnitInfo[] senseUnits(Team team)
        Returns an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit. If the team is null, it returns the units of all teams. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        team - Given team
        Returns:
        an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it.

      • senseUnits

        UnitInfo[] senseUnits(int radiusSquared)
        Returns an array with the information of all units that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        Returns:
        an array with the information of all units that can be sensed by this unit inside of a given radius around it.

      • senseUnits

        UnitInfo[] senseUnits()
        Returns an array with the information of all units that can be sensed by this unit. It costs 200 energy.
        Returns:
        an array with the information of all units that can be sensed by this unit.

      • senseVisibleTiles

        Location[] senseVisibleTiles(TileType type)
        Returns an array with all the locations of the given type inside this unit's vision range. There is a penalty if the type is null. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        type - given tile type.
        Returns:
        an array with all the locations of the given type inside this unit's vision range.

      • senseVisibleTiles

        Location[] senseVisibleTiles(int radiusSquared,
                             TileType type)
        Returns an array with all visible locations of the given type inside a given radius. There is a penalty if the type is null or the radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - given radius.
        type - given tile type.
        Returns:
        an array with all the locations of the given type inside a given radius.

      • senseShrines

        ShrineInfo[] senseShrines()
        Returns an array with the information of all shrines inside this unit's vision range. It costs 200 energy.
        Returns:
        an array with the information of all shrines inside this unit's vision range.

      • senseShrines

        ShrineInfo[] senseShrines(int radiusSquared)
        Returns an array with the information of all visible shrines inside a given radius. There is a penalty if the radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - given radius.
        Returns:
        an array with the information of all visible shrines inside a given radius.

      • senseChests

        ChestInfo[] senseChests()
        Returns an array with the information of all chests inside this unit's vision range. It costs 200 energy.
        Returns:
        an array with the information of all chests inside this unit's vision range.

      • senseChests

        ChestInfo[] senseChests(int radiusSquared)
        Returns an array with the information of all visible chests inside a given radius. There is a penalty if the radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - given radius.
        Returns:
        an array with the information of all visible chests inside a given radius.

      • canLevelUp

        boolean canLevelUp()
        Returns if this unit can level up. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can level up.

      • levelUp

        void levelUp()
        Levels up this unit. There is a penalty if this unit couldn't level up.

      • canUseFirstAbility

        boolean canUseFirstAbility(Location loc)
        Returns if this unit can use its first ability on target location. Returns true if and only if this unit has already learned an ability, has less than 1 cooldown for its first ability, and target location lies within range and is not obstructed. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - target location.
        Returns:
        if this unit can use its first ability on target location.

      • useFirstAbility

        void useFirstAbility(Location loc)
        Uses this unit's first ability on target location. There is a penalty if this unit couldn't use its first ability. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - target location.

      • canUseSecondAbility

        boolean canUseSecondAbility(Location loc)
        Returns if this unit can use its second ability on target location. Returns true if and only if this unit has already learned two ability, has less than 1 cooldown for its second ability, and target location lies within range and is not obstructed. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - target location.
        Returns:
        if this unit can use its second ability on target location.

      • useSecondAbility

        void useSecondAbility(Location loc)
        Uses this unit's second ability on target location. There is a penalty if this unit couldn't use its second ability. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - target location.

      • canOpenChest

        boolean canOpenChest(Direction dir)
        Returns if this unit can open a chest on a given direction. Returns true if and only if there is a chest in the adjacent location following the given direction and this unit can open chests. There is a penalty if the given direction is null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        dir - target direction.
        Returns:
        if this unit can open a chest on a given direction.

      • openChest

        void openChest(Direction dir)
        Orders this unit to open the chest on the given direction. There is a punishment if the unit cannot perform that action. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        dir - target direction.

      • canEnterDungeon

        boolean canEnterDungeon(Direction dirEnter,
                        Direction dirExit)
        Returns true if this unit can move this turn, there is a dungeon entrance adjacent to this unit following direction dirEnter, and the location adjacent to the entrance (inside the dungeon) following direction dirExit is accessible. There is a penalty if any direction is null. It costs 50 energy.
        Parameters:
        dirEnter - given entry direction.
        dirExit - given exit direction.
        Returns:
        true if this unit can move this turn, there is a dungeon entrance adjacent to this unit following direction dirEnter, and the location adjacent to the entrance (inside the dungeon) following direction dirExit is accessible.

      • enterDungeon

        void enterDungeon(Direction dirEnter,
                  Direction dirExit)
        Orders this unit to enter the dungeon following directions dirEnter and dirExit. There is a penalty if this unit cannot perform this action.
        Parameters:
        dirEnter - given entry direction.
        dirExit - given exit direction.

      • getArtifacts

        ArtifactInfo[] getArtifacts()
        Returns an array with all the artifacts that this unit has in possession. It costs 100 energy.
        Returns:
        an array with all the artifacts that this unit has in possession.

      • canUseArtifact

        boolean canUseArtifact(int artifactIndex)
        Returns if this unit can use the given artifact. Returns true if and only if there are at least that many artifacts, and this has not yet used the maximum number of artifacts. It costs 50 energy.
        Parameters:
        artifactIndex - index of the given artifact.
        Returns:
        if this unit can use the given artifact.

      • getArtifactsUsed

        int getArtifactsUsed()
        Returns the number of artifacts used by this unit. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        the number of artifacts used by this unit.

      • useArtifact

        void useArtifact(int artifactIndex)
        Orders this unit to use the given artifact. There is a penalty if the unit cannot perform this action. It costs 100 energy.
        Parameters:
        artifactIndex - index of the given artifact.

      • canGiveArtifact

        boolean canGiveArtifact(int index,
                        Direction dir)
        Returns if this unit can give target artifact to another unit of the same team following the given direction. Returns true if and only if there is an adjacent allied unit following the given direction. There is a penalty if the direction is null. It costs 50 energy.
        Parameters:
        index - index of target artifact.
        dir - direction of adjacent allied unit.
        Returns:
        if this unit can give target artifact to another unit of the same team following the given direction.

      • giveArtifact

        void giveArtifact(int index,
                  Direction dir)
        Orders this unit to give target artifact to an allied unit following the given direction.
        Parameters:
        index - index of target artifact.
        dir - direction of adjacent allied unit.

      • setOrientation

        void setOrientation(Direction dir)
        Sets the orientation of the unit to the target direction. There is a penalty if the given direction is null or zero. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        dir - target direction.

      • senseTileTypeAtLocation

        TileType senseTileTypeAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the unit at a given location. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the tile at a given location.

      • senseChestAtLocation

        ChestInfo senseChestAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the chest at a given location. It returns null if there is no chest (or if it has been opened). It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the chest at a given location.

      • senseShrineAtLocation

        ShrineInfo senseShrineAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the shrine at a given location. It returns null if there is no shrine. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the shrine at a given location.

      • getVisibleLocations

        Location[] getVisibleLocations()
        Returns an array with all locations that can be sensed by this unit. It costs 200 energy.
        Returns:
        an array with all locations that can be sensed by this unit.

      • killSelf

        void killSelf()
        This method kills this unit. It costs 1 energy.

      • writeOnSharedArray

        void writeOnSharedArray(int index,
                        int code)
        Writes the given value at the given index of the shared array. It costs 1 energy
        Parameters:
        index - Given index
        code - Given value

      • readOnSharedArray

        int readOnSharedArray(int index)
        Returns the value stored at the given index of the shared array. It costs 1 energy
        Parameters:
        index - Given index.
        Returns:
        the value stored at the given index of the shared array.

      • canSpawn

        boolean canSpawn(UnitType type,
                 Direction dir)
        Returns if this unit can create a unit of a given type following a given direction. It receives a penalty if either the type or direction are null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        type - Given type
        dir - Given direction
        Returns:
        if this unit can create a unit of a given type following a given direction.

      • spawn

        void spawn(UnitType type,
           Direction dir)
        Attempts to create a unit of a given type following a given direction. It receives a penalty if it can't. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        type - Given type
        dir - Given direction

      • getRound

        int getRound()
        Returns current game round. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        current game round.

      • getEnergyUsed

        int getEnergyUsed()
        Returns the energy used by this unit so far. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the energy used by this unit so far.

      • getEnergyLeft

        int getEnergyLeft()
        Returns this unit's remaining energy. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        this unit's remaining energy.

      • getPercentageOfEnergyLeft

        double getPercentageOfEnergyLeft()
        Returns the fraction of remaining energy over this unit's total energy. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the fraction of remaining energy over this unit's total energy.

      • getPercentageOfEnergyUsed

        double getPercentageOfEnergyUsed()
        Returns the percentage of this unit's total energy used so far. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the percentage of this unit's total energy used so far.

      • println

        void println(java.lang.Object o)
        Prints an object o for debug purposes. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        o - given object.

      • drawPointDebug

        void drawPointDebug(Location loc,
                    int r,
                    int g,
                    int b)
        Draws a point on the map at a given location and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates). It receives a penalty if the location is null or if the color scheme is not valid. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location.
        r - r-coordinate
        g - g-coordinate
        b - b-coordinate

      • drawLineDebug

        void drawLineDebug(Location fromLoc,
                   Location toLoc,
                   int r,
                   int g,
                   int b)
        Draws a segment on the map between a given pair of locations and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates). It receives a penalty if any of the location are null or if the color scheme is not valid. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        fromLoc - First location.
        toLoc - Second location.
        r - r-coordinate
        g - g-coordinate
        b - b-coordinate

      • getRandomDouble

        double getRandomDouble()
        Returns a randomly generated double. If this is the only random method used by both teams, all of their games with a fixed seed are identical. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        a randomly generated double.

      • yield

        void yield()
        Halts this unit's execution until the next round. It costs 1 energy.
